de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction

Interface PrimitiveDoubleSimilarityFunction<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Parameterizable, PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O,DoubleDistance>, SimilarityFunction<O,DoubleDistance>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NormalizedPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractVectorDoubleSimilarityFunction, JaccardPrimitiveSimilarityFunction, Kulczynski1SimilarityFunction, Kulczynski2SimilarityFunction, LaplaceKernelFunction, LinearKernelFunction, PolynomialKernelFunction, RadialBasisFunctionKernelFunction, RationalQuadraticKernelFunction, SigmoidKernelFunction

    public interface PrimitiveDoubleSimilarityFunction<O>
extends PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O,DoubleDistance>
    Interface for similarity functions that can provide a raw double value. This is for use in performance-critical situations that need to avoid the boxing/unboxing cost of regular distance API.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double doubleSimilarity(O o1, O o2)
      Computes the similarity between two given Objects according to this similarity function.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.SimilarityFunction
